FontString.text: DiivSkins v2.0
Horizontal and Vertical Trays
End Caps
Miscellaneous Bits
Hints and Tips
Welcome to DiivSkins 2.0!
Thank you for trying out my first Warcraft AddOn,

FontString.name: DS_Credits_Line3
FontString.text: If you have used DiivSkins before, a lot has changed!
Have a look around, There are a lot of new surprises. :)
To get started, open the MoveAnything! console.
Access it with the button above, or from your Main Game Menu.
Scroll Down the MoveAnything menu, and look for this heading:
If you don't see that, please review the installation instructions,
You are missing an important MoveAnything! file.
There are three smaller buttons in the console above.
These open slider menu's for the unique DiivSkin screen elements.
Use the sliders to configure the appearance of the DiivSkin
components, and use MoveAnything! to move and resize them.
In the future, access this console from the main Game Menu.
NOTE: When MoveAnything! hides items, they tend to stay
hidden. The [Reload UI] button above will typically resolve
any issues of this sort you may encounter during set-up.
Thanks again folks. Have Fun!
**** Diiv's Skins ****
Warcraft has a great modding community, and without it,

FontString.name: DS_Credits_Line3
FontString.text: DiivSkins would be no more than a glimmer in my mind's eye.
These are just a few of many that I owe thanks to:
SKRAG for MoveAnything! The all mighty brains behind
all of this DiivSkins fluff. You da man.
DHARGO for FlexBar, what can you say that hasn't been said.
thanks for giving all the fluff purpose. You also da man.
TELO and SHEID and MONDINGA for all of your AddOns.
Your varied works have been most inspirational for me.
SAM for SquidMod. I think you were the first to
dig in and get original with the Warcraft Art.
I only wish I was even half the artist you are, sir.
Also thanks to the community at www.WoWINTERFACE.com.
BELADONA, GELLO, of course CAIRENN, and the rest of you,
I extend my most sincere gratitude for your time and assistance.
thank you all. . .diiverr.
